description: Returns the list of all recommendations for a completed code review.

parameters.name: CodeReviewArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CodeReview object.

nested_items.name: RecommendationSummaries
nested_items.description: List of recommendations for the requested code review.

nested_items.name: FilePath
nested_items.description: Name of the file on which a recommendation is provided.

nested_items.name: RecommendationId
nested_items.description: The recommendation ID that can be used to track the provided recommendations. Later on it can be used to collect the feedback.

nested_items.name: StartLine
nested_items.description: Start line from where the recommendation is applicable in the source commit or source branch.

nested_items.name: EndLine
nested_items.description: Last line where the recommendation is applicable in the source commit or source branch. For a single line comment the start line and end line values are the same.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the recommendation generated by CodeGuru Reviewer for the lines of code between the start line and the end line.

nested_items.name: RuleMetadata
nested_items.description: Metadata about a rule. Rule metadata includes an ID, a name, a list of tags, and a short and long description. CodeGuru Reviewer uses rules to analyze code. A rule's recommendation is included in analysis results if code is detected that violates the rule.

nested_items.name: ShortDescription
nested_items.description: A short description of the rule.

nested_items.name: LongDescription
nested_items.description: A long description of the rule.

nested_items.name: RuleTags
nested_items.description: Tags that are associated with the rule.

nested_items.name: Severity
nested_items.description: The severity of the issue in the code that generated this recommendation.
